title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How FSI Revolutionized HFT Analytics with Agentic AI (GBL302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融服务行业如何通过智能体AI革新高频交易分析 (GBL302)
abstract: Research-focused quantitative analytics platforms specializing in computational finance and market microstructure investigated a key challenge in financial machine learning: the inherent bias of traditional LLMs when analyzing high-dimensional market data and temporal price series for high-frequency trading applications. This case study explores a novel agentic AI architecture that eliminates conventional model fine-tuning needs, enabling rapid deployment of advanced quantitative strategies. The solution integrates Claude models for hierarchical task decomposition and reasoning in Bedrock. This Level 300 session presents empirical results, architectural patterns, and reproducible demos using Bedrock's multi-model capabilities and Q CLI, advancing applied AI discourse in quantitative finance.
abstract_cn: 专注于研究的量化分析平台专门从事计算金融和市场微观结构研究,调查了金融机器学习中的一个关键挑战:传统大语言模型在分析高维市场数据和高频交易应用的时间价格序列时存在的固有偏差。本案例研究探讨了一种新颖的智能体AI架构,该架构消除了传统模型微调的需求,能够快速部署高级量化策略。该解决方案集成了Claude模型,用于Bedrock中的层次化任务分解和推理。这场300级别的会议展示了实证结果、架构模式以及使用Bedrock多模型能力和Q CLI的可复现演示,推进了量化金融领域应用AI的讨论。
